methods.name: read
methods.returnsDescription: The content of the file

methods.name: write
methods.returnsDescription: Whether the write operation was successful

methods.name: append
methods.returnsDescription: Whether the append operation was successful

methods.name: exists
methods.returnsDescription: Whether the file exists

methods.name: delete
methods.returnsDescription: Whether the deletion was successful

methods.name: move
methods.returnsDescription: Whether the move operation was successful

methods.name: copy
methods.returnsDescription: Whether the copy operation was successful

methods.name: list
methods.returnsDescription: An array of file names

methods.name: mkdir
methods.returnsDescription: Whether the directory was successfully created

methods.name: stat
methods.returns: { size: number, modificationDate: number, creationDate: number, type: string }
methods.returnsDescription: Object containing size (bytes), modification timestamp, creation timestamp, and type (file/directory)

methods.name: isDirectory
methods.description: Check if the path is a directory
methods.returnsDescription: Whether the path is a directory

methods.name: documentsPath
methods.returnsDescription: The absolute path of the Documents directory

methods.name: cachePath
methods.returnsDescription: The absolute path of the Caches directory

methods.name: tempPath
methods.returnsDescription: The absolute path of the Temporary directory

methods.name: debug
methods.description: Debug access permission details for a path
methods.returnsDescription: Debug information string

methods.name: rootRead
methods.description: Read protected files with Root privileges (requires TrollStore)
methods.returnsDescription: File content, or null if reading failed

methods.name: rootList
methods.description: List protected directory contents with Root privileges (requires TrollStore)
methods.returnsDescription: An array of file names, or null if it failed

methods.name: rootCopy
methods.description: Copy protected files with Root privileges (requires TrollStore)
methods.returnsDescription: Whether the copy was successful

methods.name: rootCheck
methods.description: Inspect path details with Root privileges (requires TrollStore)
methods.returns: { readable: boolean, writable: boolean, exists: boolean, isDirectory: boolean }
methods.returnsDescription: Object containing read/write permissions, existence, and other debug info

methods.name: rootExists
methods.description: Check file existence with Root privileges (requires TrollStore)
methods.returnsDescription: Whether it exists

methods.name: rootAvailable
methods.description: Check if the Root Helper is available
methods.returnsDescription: Whether the helper is available
